thread.title: Arsene Wenger prepares Alexis Sanchez and Arsenal team-mates for make-or-break clash at Liverpool
thread.title_full: Arsene Wenger prepares Alexis Sanchez and Arsenal team-mates for make-or-break clash at Liverpool

author: sstreet
title: Arsene Wenger prepares Alexis Sanchez and Arsenal team-mates for make-or-break clash at Liverpool
text:
Top Guns Arsene Wenger prepares Alexis Sanchez and Arsenal team-mates for make-or-break clash at Liverpool 
Contract rebel Alexis Sanchez is put through his paces by Arsene Wenger ahead of Arsenal's match at Anfield Pictured 3rd March 2017, 6:35 pm Updated: 3rd March 2017, 8:55 pm Comments ARSENAL have been hard at work training ahead of their huge clash at Liverpool tomorrow. 
The Gunners haven’t won at Anfield in five years and will be looking to put that record right in order to tighten their grip on a top four spot. Getty Images 7 Arsene Wenger hands down instructions to Francis Coquelin 
Boss Arsene Wenger could be seen handing down instructions to his players, who have seen their season collapse in the past few weeks. 
Keep up to date with ALL the Arsenal news, gossip, transfers and goals on our club page plus fixtures, results and live match commentary 
And it is not yet clear how the club will approach their Champions League last 16 second leg as they go into Tuesday’s match with Bayern Munich 5-1 down. 
Contract rebel Alexis Sanchez was also put through his paces amid a flurry of speculation that he is set to move to Juventus in the summer. Getty Images Alexis Sanchez is put through his paces Getty Images Aaron Ramsey is back at full health after a series of injuries Getty Images Speed king Hector Bellerin leads the team in a sprint Getty Images Gabriel (left) and Jeff Reine-Adelaide (right) vie for the ball Getty Images Hector Bellerin, Kieran Gibbs, Olivier Giroudand Nacho Monreal have a game of pig in the middle Getty Images Bellerin intercepts the ball 
The Chilean has reacted furiously after poor results against Bayern and Bournemouth this season. 
Wenger prepared Arsenal for the match in the North-West with a series of sprints and skills games. MOST READ IN SPORT TORRES trauma Shocking moment Fernando Torres was saved from swallowing his tongue by desperate team-mates after sickening clash left him out cold OFF ROO GO Manchester United ready to let Wayne Rooney join a Premier League club for NOTHING this summer IN THE GENES Sergio Aguero unsure on Man City future but son Benjamin remains keen by donning kit for day out with dad ON the Paul Paul Pogba fails to keep a low profile as he pulls into Manchester United training... with THREE women sat in the the back-seat of his car Stop Arsene around Arsenal want Arsene Wenger to make decision on his future by the end of the month bundesliga shock World Cup winner Kevin Grosskreutz SACKED by Stuttgart ...just days after horror head injury 

The Gunners are currently in fourth place, a point ahead of Liverpool having played a game less, and a win would pile the pressure on Jurgen Klopp’s men. 
And they have received a huge injury boost with Laurent Koscielny back in contention to replace Gabriel Paulista.
